verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Depart <S%H3212><s%>, and go up <S%H5927><s%> hence, thou and the people <S%H5971><s%> which thou hast brought up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> it:

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; and I will drive out <S%H1644><s%> the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>:

Unto a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>: for I will not go up <S%H5927><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee; for thou art a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>: lest I consume <S%H3615><s%> thee in the way <S%H1870><s%>.

¶ And when the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> these evil <S%H7451><s%> tidings <S%H1697><s%>, they mourned <S%H56><s%>: and no man <S%H376><s%> did put <S%H7896><s%> on him his ornaments <S%H5716><s%>.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Say <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Ye are a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>: I will come up <S%H5927><s%> into the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee in a <S%H259><s%> moment <S%H7281><s%>, and consume <S%H3615><s%> thee: therefore now put off <S%H3381><s%> thy ornaments <S%H5716><s%> from thee, that I may know <S%H3045><s%> what to do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stripped <S%H5337><s%> themselves of their ornaments <S%H5716><s%> by the mount <S%H2022><s%> Horeb <S%H2722><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, and pitched <S%H5186><s%> it without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>, afar off <S%H7368><s%> from the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> it the Tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>. And it came to pass, that every one which sought <S%H1245><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, which was without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, that all the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%>, and stood <S%H5324><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> at his tent <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>, and looked <S%H5027><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, until he was gone <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.

And it came to pass, as Moses <S%H4872><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, and the LORD talked <S%H1696><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> at the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>: and all the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> and worshipped <S%H7812><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> in his tent <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%>, as a man <S%H376><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> unto his friend <S%H7453><s%>. And he turned again <S%H7725><s%> into the camp <S%H4264><s%>: but his servant <S%H8334><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, a young man <S%H5288><s%>, departed <S%H4185><s%> not out <S%H8432><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.

¶ And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%>, thou sayest <S%H559><s%> unto me, Bring up <S%H5927><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>: and thou hast not let me know <S%H3045><s%> whom thou wilt send <S%H7971><s%> with me. Yet thou hast said <S%H559><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> thee by name <S%H8034><s%>, and thou hast also found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>.

Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, shew <S%H3045><s%> me now thy way <S%H1870><s%>, that I may know <S%H3045><s%> thee, that I may find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>: and consider <S%H7200><s%> that this nation <S%H1471><s%> is thy people <S%H5971><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, My presence <S%H6440><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> with thee, and I will give thee rest <S%H5117><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him, If thy presence <S%H6440><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> not with me, carry us not up <S%H5927><s%> hence.

For wherein shall it be known <S%H3045><s%> here <S%H645><s%> that I and thy people <S%H5971><s%> have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>? is it not in that thou goest <S%H3212><s%> with us? so shall we be separated <S%H6395><s%>, I and thy people <S%H5971><s%>, from all the people <S%H5971><s%> that are upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, I will do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> also that thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%>: for thou hast found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in my sight <S%H5869><s%>, and I know <S%H3045><s%> thee by name <S%H8034><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, I beseech thee <S%H4994><s%>, shew <S%H7200><s%> me thy glory <S%H3519><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, I will make all my goodness <S%H2898><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> before thee, and I will proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; and will be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to whom I will be gracious <S%H2603><s%>, and will shew mercy <S%H7355><s%> on whom I will shew mercy <S%H7355><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, Thou canst <S%H3201><s%> not see <S%H7200><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%>: for there shall no man <S%H120><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> me, and live <S%H2425><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold, there is a place <S%H4725><s%> by me, and thou shalt stand <S%H5324><s%> upon a rock <S%H6697><s%>:

And it shall come to pass, while my glory <S%H3519><s%> passeth by <S%H5674><s%>, that I will put <S%H7760><s%> thee in a clift <S%H5366><s%> of the rock <S%H6697><s%>, and will cover <S%H5526><s%> thee with my hand <S%H3709><s%> while <S%H5704><s%> I pass by <S%H5674><s%>:
And I will take <S%H5493><s%> away mine hand <S%H3709><s%>, and thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> my back parts <S%H268><s%>: but my face <S%H6440><s%> shall not be seen <S%H7200><s%>.
